TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
My buddies in the Air Force ROTC program (I was in the Army one in college) told me I was crazy for wanting to jump out of a perfectly good airplane.

I told them that it was a good thing they didn't have any of those left.

Things got interesting pretty quickly after that.

That might be the best comeback to that line I've ever heard...

And "interesting" used in that context might be one of the real world applications of the Firefly/Serenity definition

Oh, fortunately we were all on the ground when that discussion happened (and none of them actually flew any of the planes I did jump out of; this was some weeks later). Some of us ended up a bit closer to it than others, though.

Naturally, none of our instructors ever heard about that incident.

We're just browsing the KSP forum.
Oh of course you do:rolleyes: Then continue.
wait so what happened in the pfl thread? it is closed and seems the same to me?

So I just watched the movie of The Right Stuff with my parents.

The whole time I was watching it, I kept hearing lines from the book cropping into my head as they fit the scene.
Its a good movie. I watched it recently too.
It's front and centre in my collection

It's front and centre in my collection

And here I was thinking you had no respect for anything to do with the US Air Force
Is this seriously a real video?

wait did everyone find out on the pfl thread
No he basically sais it on his DA account but does it really matter?
not really it was just a fun conversational topic
Chobit, FYI, every time Laythe messes up my Jool orbits I blame you.

Well, I was hoping I could keep it going until my KSP account's 1st birthday in August but meh. I have testicles, and they're far bigger than anything those trolls are packing. I use a female online persona because I feel like it, it's far more fun and has much more intrigue than any-guy-on-the-street me. Despite you now knowing the truth I'll continue using my online persona just to spite those fools who think for some reason I should be hung from a lamppost or think that you'll suddenly change your opinions of me solely on the fact that I look different than my avatar. I ask that you continue addressing me as such JUST TO PISS THEM OFF.

Yes, my name is Jake Getty, I am a male of the human species. But more importantly I am Chobit-389, a proud citizen of this forum.
now why'd ya have to go and do that
so why did trekkette call you she?
I have no problem with it. Its just character of yours and why should this be not allowed.
